p: Our reporter-protein assay showed non-significant change in the levels of Renilla-luciferase protein synthesis in HepG2.2.15 cells upon treatment with the optimal dose (10 μg/ml) of all anti-HBV natural compounds ( Fig. 5). This further confirmed the specific inhibition of viral proteins (HBsAg and HBeAg), without affecting the non-viral/host protein expression by the tested compounds.
